Florist

   

Primary Trait:

Secondary Trait:

Building:

Dexterity

Agility

Flower Shop

The Florist is a specialist of your colony’s production. The Florist will grow flowers in compost blocks. For them to do this, they require compost and an axe.

If changes are needed or you think there is content missing, feel free to edit this page (the button at the top right) or submit an issue for us to make edits. - MineColonies Wiki Team
